title: SMS Spam Blocker - Postman Premium v12.1

Postman's very unique but powerful spam detection logic along with many features like 'Smart Spam Notifications', 'Automatic Spam clean up', 'One touch SMS recovery' etc makes it the best SMS Blocking application available for an Android Phone.

With Smart Spam Notifications, you can decide how often you want to be silently notified of new spam messages. Choose to see the notification instantly, or delay it to once in 'x' hours or even turn off notifications.

Try Postman for yourself and enjoy a spam free inbox. Postman is so effective & simple to use, that once started you cannot do without it.
